name: Trustfall
description:
A point and click adventure game about trust and communication made for #Heartbeat18 game jam. What do you do when you uncover evidence your partner may be keeping a secret?

Programmer: Ewan Hickey 
Twitter: @pinata_BLASTA

Artist: Heeny Ellen Yeo
http://windandmill.com/

Designer: Olga Varlamova
